## Description

## Reason for Delegation

//!
//! This module implements the factory pattern for creating payment adapter instances.

## Last Failure (Wed Jan 14 18:17:35 CET 2026)
```
<read_file path="veligo-platform/backend/src/payment/adapters/stripe.rs"/>

=== Action Results ===
bash: OK
use async_trait::async_trait;
use crate::payment::{PaymentAdapter, PaymentError, PaymentResult};

pub struct PayPalAdapter;

#[async_trait]
impl PaymentAdapter for PayPalAdapter {
    async fn process_payment(&self, amount: i64, currency: &str) -> PaymentResult<String> {
        // Simulate payment processing
        if amount <= 0 {
            return Err(PaymentError::InvalidAmount(amount));
        }
        Ok(format!("paypal_order_{}", uuid::Uuid::new_v4()))
    }

    async fn refund_payme
```
